item.title: 医疗技术公司 Brainlab、控股公司在法兰克福首次公开募股中募集 4 亿欧元资金
item.description: 医疗技术软件公司 Brainlab AG 及其股东正寻求在法兰克福首次公开募股中募集高达 4 亿欧元（4.6 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Medical technology software firm Brainlab AG and its shareholders are seeking up to €400 million ($460 million) in its Frankfurt initial public offering, as several European companies look to list ahead of the typical summer holiday break.】

item.title: 货币政策委员会委员称印度央行外汇储备可保护印度免受动荡影响
item.description: 印度利率制定小组的一位成员表示，随着中东敌对行动的持续深化，印度 7000 亿美元的外汇储备为其经济提供了应对日益加剧的地缘政治动荡的重要缓冲。【原文：India’s $700 billion in foreign exchange reserves gives the economy a crucial cushion against rising geopolitical turmoil, a member of India’s rate-setting panel said, as hostilities in the Middle East continue to deepen.】

item.title: 日本自民党在东京全国投票前惨败
item.description: 日本执政党自民党在东京都选举中遭遇了有史以来最糟糕的结果，在选民对首相石破茂的首相职位作出全国投票裁决前不到一个月的时间里，自民党失去了议会最大政治力量的地位。【原文：Japan’s ruling Liberal Democratic Party suffered its worst-ever result in a Tokyo metropolitan election, losing its spot as the biggest political force on the assembly less than a month before voters deliver a verdict on Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba’s premiership in a national vote.】

item.title: 沃尔玛旗下 PhonePe 据称将寻求 15 亿美元在印度上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度最大的数字支付提供商沃尔玛公司（Walmart Inc.【原文：Walmart Inc.’s PhonePe, India’s largest provider of digital payments, is preparing to file preliminary documents for an initial public offering that may raise as much as $1.5 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 伊朗袭击暴露亚洲对中东石油的依赖
item.description: 亚洲各地的石油买家和贸易商正屏息凝视着伊朗周边冲突的升级，因为这个最大的进口地区正在为波斯湾出口中断造成的影响做准备。【原文：Oil buyers and traders across Asia are watching the escalation of a conflict around Iran with bated breath, as the top importing region braces for the impact of any disruption of exports from the Persian Gulf.】

item.title: 英国创建市政债券市场的努力无果而终
item.description: 英国一家为启动本国市政债券市场而成立的机构已停止开展新业务，放弃了长达十年之久的效仿欧美活跃市场的努力。【原文：A UK agency set up to kick-start the country’s municipal bond scene has closed to new business, abandoning a decade-long push to emulate vibrant markets in the US and Europe.】

item.title: Prosus 在首席执行官布洛伊斯的新战略下首次实现盈利
item.description: 技术投资者 Prosus NV 在首席执行官 Fabricio Bloisi 的领导下改变战略，首次实现盈利。【原文：Technology investor Prosus NV swung into profit for the first time, as it switches strategy under Chief Executive Officer Fabricio Bloisi.】

item.title: 埃尼公司将以约 20 亿欧元的价格向 Ares 公司出售 Plenitude 公司 20% 的股份
item.description: 埃尼公司（Eni SpA）同意以约 20 亿欧元（23 亿美元）的价格将其可再生部门 Plenitude 20% 的股份出售给 Ares Alternative Credit Management，这是该部门的第二次股权出售。【原文：Eni SpA agreed to sell a 20% holding in its renewable arm Plenitude to Ares Alternative Credit Management for about €2 billion ($2.3 billion), a second stake sale in the unit.】

item.title: 直播：英国富时 100 指数和英镑下跌，交易员权衡美国对伊朗的打击
据说揽胜智能将探索在香港二次上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国数据中心业务服务提供商揽胜智能计算科技集团股份有限公司（Range Intelligent Computing Technology Group Co.【原文：Range Intelligent Computing Technology Group Co., a Chinese data center business services provider, is considering a second listing in Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度 6 月速报采购经理人指数显示出口订单飙升，经济增长稳健
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的一项即时调查显示，在新出口订单激增推动制造业发展的带动下，印度 6 月份的经济活动有所回升。【原文：India’s economic activity picked up in June, driven by a surge in new export orders that boosted the manufacturing sector, according to a flash survey by HSBC Holdings Plc.】

item.title: 新加坡核心通胀放缓，文娱用品价格再度下跌
item.description: 由于娱乐产品价格持续下降，新加坡 5 月份的主要通胀指标有所放缓。【原文：Singapore’s key inflation gauge slowed in May due to a continued decline in recreation prices.】

item.title: 比起电动汽车成本，Uber 司机现在更关心充电问题
item.description:
"我们必须开始工作，"公司电气化主管说。【原文：

‘We’ve got to get to work,’ the company’s head of electrification says.

】

item.title: 美国打击伊朗引发石油担忧，新兴资产下跌
item.description: 本周伊始，亚洲货币和股市下跌，原因是美国对伊朗的打击令投资者感到恐慌，并推高了油价。【原文：Asian currencies and stocks fell at the start of the week, as US strikes on Iran rattled investors and pushed up the price of oil.】

item.title: 中国土地出让收入创十年新低，预算赤字不断扩大
item.description: 中国的土地出让收入骤降至十年来的最低点，导致预算赤字扩大，因为政府加大了支持经济的支出。【原文：China’s revenue from selling land plunged to the lowest in a decade, contributing to the widening of budget deficit as the government ramped up spending in support of the economy.】

item.title: 特朗普并非总是畏首畏尾
item.description:
如果说有希望的典范，那可能就是 1991 年海湾战争的迅速结束。【原文：

If there’s a model for hope how, it may lie in how quickly the 1991 Gulf War ended.

】

item.title: 韩国交易所准备推出碳排放期货
item.description: 韩国的主要证券交易所计划推出碳排放期货，以深化该行业的市场，帮助韩国在 2050 年前实现净零排放。【原文：South Korea’s main stock exchange plans to roll out futures on carbon emissions to deepen the market for the sector and help with the nation’s push toward net-zero emissions by 2050.】

item.title: 日本采购经理人指数回升表明美国加征关税前的前置性调整
item.description: 6 月份，日本制造业活动出现一年多来的首次扩张，这很可能是在美国下月按计划提高关税之前产出前置的迹象。【原文：Japan’s manufacturing activity expanded for the first time in more than a year in June in a likely sign of front-loading of output ahead of a scheduled increase in US tariffs next month.】

item.title: 建屋局首次公开募股大幅折价为印度投资者提供现实检验
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 日本激进分子的影响力在股东否决大洋集团首席执行官一事中显露无遗
item.description: 上周末，股东们否决了佐藤英二连任大洋控股公司首席执行官，这是一个罕见的事件，凸显了激进分子在日本股票市场日益增长的影响力。【原文：Shareholders’ rejection of another term for Eiji Sato as Taiyo Holdings Co. chief executive officer over the weekend was a rare event highlighting the growing clout of activists in Japan’s stock market.】

item.title: 瑞银下调泰国股市评级至 "中性"，原因是政治忧虑加重
item.description: 瑞银集团策略师将泰国股票评级从 "增持 "下调至 "中性"，理由是近期的政治不确定性可能会影响政策方向和投资者情绪。【原文：UBS Group AG strategists downgraded Thai stocks to neutral from overweight, citing recent political uncertainty which could impact policy direction and investor sentiment.】

item.title: 据称蒙太奇将为 10 亿美元的香港上市聘请银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国芯片设计公司澜起科技已为其香港上市计划聘请了银行，该上市计划可能融资约 10 亿美元。【原文：Chinese chip designer Montage Technology Co. has hired banks for its planned Hong Kong listing that could raise about $1 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 刚果延长禁令后中国钴价和库存飙升
item.description: 刚果民主共和国将出口禁令延长至 9 月，限制了合金和电池所用原材料的供应，此后中国的钴价和库存飙升。【原文：Cobalt prices and stocks surged in China after the Democratic Republic of Congo extended its export ban to September, constricting supplies of the raw material used in alloys and batteries.】

item.title: 中国的降雨正值煤炭和大坝行业的关键时刻
item.description: 中国西南部和中部地区连绵不断的暴雨正在灌满为中国巨大水坝提供水源的河流和水库，这对与水力发电竞争的煤炭市场构成了另一个威胁。【原文：The heavy rains rolling though southwestern and central China are filling up the rivers and reservoirs that feed the country’s mighty dams, posing another threat to the coal market that competes with hydropower in electricity generation.】

item.title: 高盛：中东局势下石油和天然气价格有望上涨
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. flagged the possibility of higher oil and gas prices after the US struck Iran, even as the bank’s base-case outlook hinges on major disruptions to supplies from the region.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织总裁格奥尔基耶娃警告美国打击伊朗将带来更大风险
item.description: 国际货币基金组织总裁克里斯塔琳娜-格奥尔基耶娃（Kristalina Georgieva）警告说，随着全球不确定性的升级，美国对伊朗的打击可能会在能源渠道之外产生更广泛的影响。【原文：International Monetary Fund Managing Director Kristalina Georgieva warned that the US strikes on Iran could potentially have broader impacts beyond energy channels, as global uncertainty escalates.】

item.title: 卢比跌至关键水平附近考验印度央行对波动的容忍度
item.description: 印度卢比对美元的跌势正将其推向一个临界点，从而引发了在全球紧张局势加剧之际印度央行可能会出手稳定货币的预期。【原文：The Indian rupee’s decline against the dollar is pushing it closer to a critical threshold, raising expectations that the nation’s central bank may step in to stabilize the currency as global tensions mount.】

item.title: 特斯拉低调推出期待已久的机器人出租车服务
item.description: 特斯拉公司周日向少数乘客推出了其承诺已久的无人驾驶出租车服务，这是埃隆马斯克（Elon Musk）认为具有变革意义的新业务线的一次小规模亮相。【原文：Tesla Inc. rolled out its long-promised driverless taxi service to a handful of riders Sunday, a modest debut for what Elon Musk sees as a transformative new business line.】

item.title: 日本股东大会用免费赠品吸引投资者
item.description: 越来越多的日本公司在年度股东大会上赠送礼品，这种做法可能会增加忠实散户投资者的数量，因为来自激进投资者的压力越来越大。【原文：More Japanese companies are giving gifts at annual general meetings in a practice that could increase the ranks of loyal retail investors as pressure from activist investors grows.】

item.title: 美国打击伊朗后，石油市场再添不确定性
item.description: 美国上周末对伊朗的打击增加了全球石油供应的风险，而迄今为止，全球石油供应并未受到中东多年来一些最极端军事行动的影响。【原文：US strikes on Iran over the weekend have added to risks for global oil supply, which has so far been unaffected by some of the most extreme military actions in the Middle East in years.】
